column2: So long as the Master Chef is out of combat, he will keep cooking revitalising food for his fellow Halflings.
A little bit of Rhya’s fancy
The Rumster Clan of Halflings are known to make anything put in a pie taste good... even each other
One of the longshanks brought these mean little buggers from Lustria... Why don't you have a taste?
So you want to get my food? WELL, CHOKE ON IT!
